snippet.title: Assassin's Creed Altaïr's Chronicles HD - iPad - Trailer
snippet.description:
NOW AVAILABLE ON THE APPSTORE for iPad: http://j.mp/g6O5Ah

The benchmark of action/adventure games on next-gen consoles lands for the first time on iPad, with entirely refined graphics and optimized camera.

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
